ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Hi everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 4th level, almost all casters are the same.  Don t worry about grouping, just kill stuff.  Around L6 head into BlackBurrow, around L9, start thinking about
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 15 Sep 2000, Chris Anderson wrote:

> hunting with a friend in Qeynos Hills right now, I'm 4th level.

4th level, almost all casters are the same. Don't worry about grouping,
just kill stuff. Around L6 head into BlackBurrow, around L9, start
thinking about joining bandit groups in W Karana.

> 4. Enfeeblement

Have you noticed any effect when using or not using this? I didn't, so I
stopped memming it.

> 5. Watch Animation beat up critter, sometimes help.

Help a bit more, keep your defense and combat skills up.

> 6. Run away recast Animation and help finish it off.

You shouldn't need to recast animation very often if you're willing to
step in and take a few hits. Your animation regens a lot faster than your
mana comes back, so keeping it alive is a good thing.

> PS: Where in Qeynos do I buy The daggers for the Animation spells? I lookf
> for hours, and go very lost.

You have to go back to Erudin to buy them. If you can afford to, just buy
a packfull.
--
Mark Rafn dagon@... <http://www.dagon.net/>
